title: Athletism — Rowing (Elite) — Phase 2: Aerobic Base & Technique Consolidation
goal: Extend aerobic capacity and stabilize stroke efficiency under mild load.

warmup: Technical drills: pick drill / pause @ arms-only / legs-only
main: RowErg: 4x20' @UT1 (2' easy) — alt. drag factor for feel
Strength: 5x5 Front Squat @RPE7, 4x6 Bench Pull, 3x8 Hip Thrust
Boat: rate ladder 16–18–20 spm x3 blocks
cooldown: Light stretching (Posterior chain, lats, hip flexors)

notes: Week 1: Steady state density ↑. Week 2: add one threshold touch (20').
